languages.text: {n}Каллигос продолжает что-то говорить, но Маражай уже не смотрит на него — взгляд прищуренных глаз направлен на вас. Вы вдруг понимаете, что выходка друкари имеет одну цель — увидеть вашу реакцию на его непокорство.{/n}

{n}Calligos continues speaking, but Marazhai is no longer looking at him — his narrowed eyes are focused on you. You suddenly realise that the Drukhari's comment had a single purpose: to gauge your reaction to his insubordination.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Каллигос продолжает что-то говорить, но Маражай уже не смотрит на него — взгляд прищуренных глаз направлен на вас. Вы вдруг понимаете, что выходка друкари имеет одну цель — увидеть вашу реакцию на его непокорство.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Calligos sigue hablando, pero Marazhai ya no le mira a él; sus ojos entornados están fijos en ti. De repente caes en la cuenta de que el comentario del Drukhari tenía un único propósito: comprobar tu reacción a su insubordinación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos continues speaking, but Marazhai is no longer looking at him — his narrowed eyes are focused on you. You suddenly realise that the Drukhari's comment had a single purpose: to gauge your reaction to his insubordination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos sigue hablando, pero Marazhai ya no le mira a él; sus ojos entornados están fijos en ti. De repente caes en la cuenta de que el comentario del Drukhari tenía un único propósito: comprobar tu reacción a su insubordinación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯仍然在喋喋不休，但玛拉斋没再看他，而是眯起眼睛，盯着你。你突然意识到，玛拉斋说这些话只有一个目的，那就是看看你对他的忤逆会有怎样的反应。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos continues speaking, but Marazhai is no longer looking at him — his narrowed eyes are focused on you. You suddenly realise that the Drukhari's comment had a single purpose: to gauge your reaction to his insubordination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯仍然在喋喋不休，但玛拉斋没再看他，而是眯起眼睛，盯着你。你突然意识到，玛拉斋说这些话只有一个目的，那就是看看你对他的忤逆会有怎样的反应。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Calligos continue à parler, mais Marazhai ne le regarde plus : ses yeux plissés sont fixés sur vous. Vous réalisez soudain que le commentaire du Drukhari n'avait qu'un seul objectif : jauger votre réaction face à son insubordination.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos continues speaking, but Marazhai is no longer looking at him — his narrowed eyes are focused on you. You suddenly realise that the Drukhari's comment had a single purpose: to gauge your reaction to his insubordination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos continue à parler, mais Marazhai ne le regarde plus : ses yeux plissés sont fixés sur vous. Vous réalisez soudain que le commentaire du Drukhari n'avait qu'un seul objectif : jauger votre réaction face à son insubordination.{/n}

languages.text: {n}カリゴスは言葉を続けるが、マラズハイはもはやカリゴスを見ていない…その細められた目は、あなたに注がれている。あなたは突如、デュカーリの発言の目的がただひとつ、彼の反抗に対するあなたの反応を見るためだったことに気づく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos continues speaking, but Marazhai is no longer looking at him — his narrowed eyes are focused on you. You suddenly realise that the Drukhari's comment had a single purpose: to gauge your reaction to his insubordination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴスは言葉を続けるが、マラズハイはもはやカリゴスを見ていない…その細められた目は、あなたに注がれている。あなたは突如、デュカーリの発言の目的がただひとつ、彼の反抗に対するあなたの反応を見るためだったことに気づく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Calligos spricht weiter, doch Marazhai sieht ihn nicht länger an. Seine verengten Augen sind auf dich gerichtet. Du erkennst plötzlich, dass die Bemerkung des Drukharis nur einen einzigen Zweck hatte: Deine Reaktion auf seinen Ungehorsam abzuspüren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos continues speaking, but Marazhai is no longer looking at him — his narrowed eyes are focused on you. You suddenly realise that the Drukhari's comment had a single purpose: to gauge your reaction to his insubordination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos spricht weiter, doch Marazhai sieht ihn nicht länger an. Seine verengten Augen sind auf dich gerichtet. Du erkennst plötzlich, dass die Bemerkung des Drukharis nur einen einzigen Zweck hatte: Deine Reaktion auf seinen Ungehorsam abzuspüren.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Calligos konuşmayı sürdürse de Marazhai, artık ona bakmıyor. Kısık gözleri sana odaklanıyor. Aniden Drukhari'nin yaptığı yorumun tek bir amacı olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Gösterdiği itaatsizliğe tepkini ölçmeye çalışıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos continues speaking, but Marazhai is no longer looking at him — his narrowed eyes are focused on you. You suddenly realise that the Drukhari's comment had a single purpose: to gauge your reaction to his insubordination.{/n}
